programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: The little things that make a big impression in a home; from a loving ode to mid-century California chic, to an ultra-modern estate built onto the side of a desert canyon.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Tour a Venice, Calif., home that dissolves the barriers between indoors and outdoors; how designer Jeff Troyer embraced his client's desire for zen-like tranquility in Sherman Oaks.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Visiting the South Florida ideal at an architectural gem in Coral Gables; some dramatic décor in Brooklyn, N.Y.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Designers and artists show how they embrace and are inspired by color in their home décor.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Distinctive design from the Pacific Palisades to Miami; George Oliphant has the perfect fix for a design-challenged young family.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: A visit to Montreal for an inside look at what it's like to live at the iconic Habitat 67.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Go beyond the gates of a Bucolic Lakeside retreat in Westchester; a penthouse battle between Midtown, New York, and Downtown, Los Angeles.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Homes overlooking the iconic Sunset Strip, including a contemporary property with cinematic views and a stilt-supported mid-century modern icon.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Patricia Altschul from Bravo TV's "Southern Charm" shows off her grand Charleston, South Carolina estate; renowned chef Mike Lata shows what eating in the southern city is all about.

programme.title: Open House
programme.desc: Celebrating some of the most innovative and exciting design professionals in the industry in honor of Black History Month.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: Ashley explores new alternative workouts; from hitting the concrete with the Moxi Skate Team to skipping rope in the Double Dutch Empire, Ashley shows the lighter side of fitness.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: Pet Vet Dr. Evan Antin joins Ashley for date night at Malibu Wine Safaris, a vineyard and safari park in California.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: Ashley battles land, air and sea as she confronts her fish phobia and learns how to escape a submerged aircraft; Ashley expands her artistic horizon as a slam poet and shares the stage with a 6-foot snake.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: Ashley travels to the big peach for some true Southern comfort, a healthy fixing of music, and culture.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: Ashely travels the country and gets down and dirty in some of the most filthy jobs that exist; cleaning the famed Hollywood Sign; cleaning up after exotic animals; Boston Public Works department.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: From soaring through the air with the Olympic diving team, to shaping the landscape with some big cat machinery, Ashley takes the elements by surprise.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: Johnny Bananas Devenanzio hosts a guide to the best in food, nightlife, travel and more from across the country.

programme.title: 1st Look
programme.desc: Ashley sits down with Hollywood actor Danny Trejo; Ashley plays a zombie in "The Fight for the Living Dead"; surfing in Malibu; skiing Mammoth.

programme.desc: Celebrity designer Kathryn Ireland shows off her Santa Monica home; designer Mark Culter tours his latest masterpiece.

programme.desc: Visiting former homes of old Hollywood stars such as Katharine Hepburn's Connecticut estate, Bob and Dolores Hope's Toluca Lake estate, and Spencer Tracey and Agnes Moorehead's L.A. area residence.

programme.desc: Tour Robert Deniro's former NYC Penthouse; celebrity stager Cheryl Eisen shares design tips to give a home an upgraded style.
